numbered_ace_sentences: 2. Students whose parents earn a higher income are more likely to get accepted into elite colleges.
3. I wonder why wealthier families have an advantage in getting accepted into elite colleges.
4. Lower-class families have less advantage in getting accepted into elite colleges.
5. This situation does not relate to me at the moment.
6. I am not trying to get into an elite college at the moment.
7. I am not trying to get into an Ivy League college at the moment.
8. This situation might relate to my community.
9. Most students in my community are wealthy.
10. Most families in my community are wealthy.
11. I see that most hard-working students in my community get accepted into good colleges.
12. The headline is: Acceptance into College: Higher Legacy vs Higher Capability.
